directions.text: Take the coconut out of the freezer and let it partially thaw
Put all ingredients into a food processor.  Process, scraping down the sides a few times.
Adjust lemon, salt, and sugar, and chillies to taste.
Pack into small containers and freeze what you will not eat in 2 or 3 days.
Excellent with Idli, with butter and cheese and tomato on a sandwich, on the side of any dinner.

ingredients.comment: frozen package (available at Indian grocery stores)
(reduce the cilantro if you use mint.)
